channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Flash Player
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Flash Player

item.title: CVE-2020-3757|2024-08-04T07:44:50.458Z -- adobe -- adobe%20flash%20player
item.description: Adobe Flash Player versions 32.0.0.321 and earlier, 32.0.0.314 and earlier, 32.0.0.321 and earlier, and 32.0.0.255 and earlier have a type confusion vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.
